title: Nasus Wither!
body: Can anyone explain to me how a 90% point and click slow has been in the game for so long without a nerf? Makes 0 sense as to how that seems in any way balanced. Should be reduced by a large amount.

replies.body: Zilean has a point and click slow that *immediately* applies a 99% slow. Not built up over time.

Cause its single target, deals 0 damage, has a short range, and its user is strictly melee with no MS buffs or gap closers.

Its perfectly fine.
LOL, everything i said about it is 100% FACTUALLY correct, so what is "WRONG" besides that you probably played an immobile squishy champion and got reck't by Susan.
It should NOT lower attack speed considering the amount it already slows, and he should not be able to cast it again before the duration ends, that is just mind boggling to me

> [{quoted}](name=Jenivie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2RHIAgWa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-07T05:05:17.132+0000)
>
> It should NOT lower attack speed considering the amount it already slows, and he should not be able to cast it again before the duration ends, that is just mind boggling to me

He can only get 100% uptime with {{item:3161}}, which I'm pretty sure he doesn't buy.

Yeah...Nasus doesn't really get SoS. The effects it'd give to Q would be miniscule (since you only really have time for a single auto between Q's anyways in R in late-game, and two at most), reducing uptime on E wouldn't help since it drains the shit out of his mana and he'd probably start *losing* damage due to cast time on E, and the utility gained by ~1-2s less on W from SoJ could be gotten more consistently with any number of other items (Tbh, even Ohmwrecker would be a better utility buy at that point).

Did You Know:

Wither's AS slow used to go up to 95% until 2013, when that component was reduced by half.
But in what way is it balanced now? Where is the counterplay?

> [{quoted}](name=MyTeamWillFEED,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2RHIAgWa,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-07T20:30:39.353+0000)
>
> But in what way is it balanced now? Where is the counterplay?

Cleanse, QSS, Merc's, Swifties, dash/blink, Garen Q, Yi R, Morg E, Olaf R, knockbacks...
Without a nerf? It used to slow Attack speed by the same amount, it used to have more range, and his ult used to increase the range of it.
